content: I have a URL in an example resource that the IG builder is happily making into a clickable link, then complaining that the link is not valid. (it is actually a urn, canonical URI, not a http url). I thought I could use the 'special-url' parameter, but that did not seem to work. I might have done that wrong? or is there some other method?
the only place I have that URL is in example elements
I guess submit a Git issue against the publisher with a link to the IG branch to use to reproduce the issue
okay. no worry. for now I will just ignore the error. I just didn't want to be ignoring an error if there was a solution I simply didn't know about.
